titleStmt.title: The Lord Craven's case, briefly stated
titleStmt.author: Craven, William Craven, Earl of, 1606-1697.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Includes a condensation of Craven's petition to Parliament for the release of his estates.
Included are orders issued by Parliament concerning Lord Craven.
Not the same text as Wing L3045A.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
